verbs.description: [ARG0: Kim Jong - un] [V: affirmed] [ARG1: an ' unwavering commitment to complete denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula '] [ARGM-LOC: in a sign document] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , President Donald Trump says .
Kim Jong - un affirmed an ' unwavering commitment to [V: complete] [ARG1: denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula] ' in a sign document on Tuesday , President Donald Trump says .
Kim Jong - un affirmed an ' unwavering commitment to complete denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula ' in a sign document on Tuesday , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] .
